title: Walruses and Arctic Sea Ice Retreat

und.value:
[caption id="attachment_1426" align="alignleft" width="300" caption="Walruses off the northwestern Alaska coast."][/caption] USGS scientists study walruses off the northwestern Alaska coast in August as part of their ongoing study of how the Pacific walrus are responding to reduced sea ice conditions in late summer and fall.           More Information:
  • News Release - Pacific Walruses Studied as Sea Ice Melts
  • Podcast - Projecting the future population status of the Pacific walrus
  • Walrus FAQs
  • USGS Alaska Science Center Walrus Page
